text: Bɨ anɨb ak takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Pen ensel ne Piladelpiya binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak, takaw agɨnɨgebin ak ensel ak nop kɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ suŋtep ak, ne takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨl, bɨnonɨm Depid ki nop ak dɨ mɨdeb agak. Bɨ anɨb ak kanɨb yɨkek, binɨb ogɨnap gɨñɨnɨgel tek ma lup pen gɨñek, yɨkɨnɨgel tek ma lup ak, takaw nɨm ak agyokeb agak.
